definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: Yesterday I made mistakes, then I correct them today and warn myself not to mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我犯错了，于是我今天改过并告诫自己不可重犯。

sentences.english: Draw lessons from mistake,don't make same mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 从错误中吸取教训，不要重犯旧错。

sentences.english: We are anxious that the same mistake is not repeated in the current round of negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 我们殷切希望在新一轮谈判中不要重犯同样的错误。

sentences.english: Officials insist they will not make the same mistake this time.
sentences.chinese: 政府官员坚称，这一次他们不会重犯同样的错误。
我成了一个已定罪的全国重犯。

sentences.english: You must take measures in order that such mistakes may never be made again.
sentences.chinese: 为了不致重犯这类错误，你必须采取措施。

sentences.english: They don't want to repeat mistakes made by their predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 他们不想重犯前人犯过的错误。

sentences.english: We must avoid repeating these mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 我们要避免重犯这些错误。

prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
